subject: Downlaod Great RPGs on Direct2Drive!
body:
Direct2Drive








June 1st, 2007





















Neverwinter Nights 2 - $29.95
It takes the player from the tiniest of villages into a sweeping tale of danger and war, chronicling their rise from a peasant to a full-fledged hero of the Realms, defending it against one of the greatest threats of the age...
 
Oblivion + Shivering Isles Bundle - $69.95
Oblivion is the quintessential role-playing game for the next generation and another leap forward in gaming. et Oblivion + the Shivering Isles Expansion together and save $10! 
 
Titan Quest Bundle - $44.95
Discover the Courage that Turns Heroes Into Legends. Get Titan Quest and the Immortal Throne Expansion together and save $5!


 
 
 
 
 


Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines - $19.95
You begin your journey this time in modern day Los Angeles as a newly embraced vampire. By creating you without the consent of your clan's Elders, your sire has violated one of vampire society's most hallowed laws...
 
Jade Empire: Special Edition - $39.95
Jade Empire: Special Edition delivers an incredible story-driven game play experience with stunning high-resolution graphics and controls optimized for the PC gaming experience. 
 
LEISURE SUIT LARRY: MCL-UNCUT AND UNCENSORED - $29.95
When a reality TV dating show comes to campus, Larry decides he's going to revitalize his life by winning the contest and proving once and for all that he can live up to the shining example set by his Old Uncle Larry.
